about_the_game:
Welcome to Full Gear! This steampunk-style traditional roguelike is all about information: learn new things, die from an unknown attack, repeat. Use goggles, guns and gadgets to get a gain on the gears, and find... whatever you're looking for down there. You keep forgetting your goal, don't you Devi? Eyes on the prize!
With more than 200 unique items to equip, throw, shoot, learn and lose, there's plenty of possibilities to crash your wrench into the drones patrolling the area. And sometimes your own drones as well.
In this demo version, you'll get to see if the full game is something right up your alley!

Featuring:
  • 3 sprawling areas, all in one giant room, to traverse
  • 21 unique enemies, completely animated in cute pixel art style
  • 4 NPC's with their own hopes, dreams, aspirations, and make-shift shops
  • 9 Boosts and 9 Challenges to make the game harder - or easier - at will
  • 4 bosses!

    This demo contains full functionality, however, only two areas out of four random areas will be generated.

short_description: Fight and engineer your way through a steampunk dungeon in this demo of a traditional roguelike. Build Drones to gain additional firepower, use Wheel Tokens to time your attacks, and learn from the past as you go. Are you better than the machines?
